category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: EPM_sub_process_target_inheritance
preference.preference_description: Defines the default setting of the 'Inherit Targets' checkbox in the 'New Workflow Sub-Process' dialog. Valid values are ON/OFF: ON - the 'Inherit Targets' checkbox will be ticked. OFF - the 'Inherit Targets' checkbox will not be ticked. This is a site preference.
